verses.verse: In the <S%G746>beginning<s%> was the <S%G3056>Word,<s%> and the <S%G3056>Word<s%> was with <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G3056>Word<s%> was <S%G2316>God.<s%>
He was in the <S%G746>beginning<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> into <S%G1096>being<s%> by Him, and <S%G5565>apart<s%> from Him <S%G3761>nothing<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> into <S%G1096>being<s%> that has <S%G1096>come<s%> into <S%G1096>being.<s%>
In Him was <S%G2222>life,<s%> and the <S%G2222>life<s%> was the <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
And the <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G5316>shines<s%> in the <S%G4653>darkness,<s%> and the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> did not <S%G2638>comprehend<s%> it.
There <S%G1096>came<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G846>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G2491>John.<s%>

He <S%G2064>came<s%> for a <S%G3141>witness,<s%> that he might <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of the <S%G5457>light,<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> might <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> him.
He was not the <S%G5457>light,<s%> but [came] that he might <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of the <S%G5457>light.<s%>
There was the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G3739>which,<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G5461>enlightens<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>
He was in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and the <S%G2889>world<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Him, and the <S%G2889>world<s%> did not <S%G1097>know<s%> Him.
He <S%G2064>came<s%> to His <S%G2398>own,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who were His <S%G2398>own<s%> did not <S%G3880>receive<s%> Him.

But as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G2983>received<s%> Him, to them He <S%G1325>gave<s%> the <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> [even] to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believe<s%> in His <S%G3686>name,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> were <S%G1080>born<s%> not of <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G435>man,<s%> but of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G3056>Word<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and <S%G4637>dwelt<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> us, and we <S%G2300>beheld<s%> His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> as of the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> from the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> and <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Him, and <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> was He of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me <S%G1096>has<s%> a <S%G1715>higher<s%> <S%G1715>rank<s%> than I, for He <S%G1510>existed<s%> <S%G4413>before<s%> me.'"
For of His <S%G4138>fulness<s%> we have <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2983>received,<s%> and <S%G5485>grace<s%> upon <S%G5485>grace.<s%>

For the <S%G3551>Law<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3475>Moses;<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> and <S%G225>truth<s%> were <S%G1096>realized<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> has <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> at <S%G4455>any<s%> <S%G4455>time;<s%> the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who is in the <S%G2859>bosom<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> He has <S%G1834>explained<s%> [Him.]

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> to him <S%G2409>priests<s%> and <S%G3019>Levites<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> him, <S%G5101>"Who<s%> are you?"
And he <S%G3670>confessed,<s%> and did not <S%G720>deny,<s%> and he <S%G3670>confessed,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> not the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>"

And they <S%G2065>asked<s%> him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Are you <S%G2243>Elijah<s%>?" And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> not." "Are you the <S%G4396>Prophet<s%>?" And he <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3756>"No.<s%>"

They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> to him, <S%G5101>"Who<s%> are you, <S%G2443>so<s%> that we may <S%G1325>give<s%> an <S%G612>answer<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> us? <S%G5101>What<s%> do you <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%>?"

He <S%G5346>said,<s%> "I am a <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2116>'Make<s%> <S%G2116>straight<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>' as <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G3004>said.<s%>"
<S%G2532>Now<s%> they had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> from the <S%G5330>Pharisees.<s%>

And they <S%G2065>asked<s%> him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> are you <S%G907>baptizing,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you are not the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> the <S%G4396>Prophet<s%>?"

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G907>baptize<s%> in <S%G5204>water,<s%> [but] <S%G3319>among<s%> you <S%G4739>stands<s%> One <S%G3739>whom<s%> you do not <S%G3609>know.<s%>
"[It is] He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me, the <S%G2438>thong<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>sandal<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>untie.<s%>"

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>took<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> in <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G907>baptizing.<s%>

The <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> he <S%G991>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G266>sin<s%> of the <S%G2889>world!<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is He on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3694>'After<s%> me <S%G2064>comes<s%> a <S%G435>Man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1096>has<s%> a <S%G1715>higher<s%> <S%G1715>rank<s%> than I, for He <S%G1510>existed<s%> <S%G4413>before<s%> me.'
"And I did not <S%G3609>recognize<s%> Him, but in <S%G2443>order<s%> that He might be <S%G5319>manifested<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> in <S%G5204>water.<s%>"

And <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I have <S%G2300>beheld<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> as a <S%G4058>dove<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and He <S%G3306>remained<s%> upon Him.

"And I did not <S%G3609>recognize<s%> Him, but He who <S%G3992>sent<s%> me to <S%G907>baptize<s%> in <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, 'He upon <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> and <S%G3306>remaining<s%> upon Him, <S%G3778>this<s%> is the one who <S%G907>baptizes<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>'
"And I have <S%G3708>seen,<s%> and have <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
<S%G3825>Again<s%> the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G2476>standing<s%> with <S%G1417>two<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>
and he <S%G1689>looked<s%> upon <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> as He <S%G4043>walked,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"
And the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> him <S%G2980>speak,<s%> and they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turned,<s%> and <S%G2300>beheld<s%> them <S%G190>following,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G2212>seek<s%>?" And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4461>"Rabbi<s%> <S%G3739>(which<s%> <S%G3177>translated<s%> <S%G3004>means<s%> <S%G1320>Teacher<s%>), <S%G4226>where<s%> are You <S%G3306>staying<s%>?"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2064>"Come,<s%> and you will <S%G3708>see.<s%>" They <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> and <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> He was <S%G3306>staying;<s%> and they <S%G3306>stayed<s%> with Him that <S%G2250>day,<s%> for it was <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G1182>tenth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>
<S%G1520>One<s%> of the <S%G1417>two<s%> who <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> [speak,] and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him, was <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> Peter's <S%G80>brother.<s%>

He <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "We have <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G3323>Messiah<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> <S%G3177>translated<s%> <S%G1510>means<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>).

He <S%G71>brought<s%> him to <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>looked<s%> at him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You are <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2491>John;<s%> you shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> is <S%G2059>translated<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>).

The <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> He <S%G2309>purposed<s%> to <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> into <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and He <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5376>Philip.<s%> And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>"Follow<s%> Me."
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> was from <S%G966>Bethsaida,<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G406>Andrew<s%> and <S%G4074>Peter.<s%>

<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "We have <S%G2147>found<s%> Him of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law<s%> and [also] the <S%G4396>Prophets<s%> <S%G1125>wrote,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>"

And <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1410>"Can<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>thing<s%> <S%G1510>come<s%> out of <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>?" <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2064>"Come<s%> and <S%G3708>see.<s%> "

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> to Him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> of him, <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> an <S%G2475>Israelite<s%> <S%G230>indeed,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1388>guile!<s%>"

<S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4159>"How<s%> do You <S%G1097>know<s%> me?" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4253>"Before<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> you, when you were <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> you."
<S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> You are the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3754>"Because<s%> I <S%G3004>said<s%> to you that I <S%G3708>saw<s%> you <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> do you <S%G4100>believe<s%>? You shall <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> <S%G3173>things<s%> than <S%G3778>these.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, you shall <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G455>opened,<s%> and the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G305>ascending<s%> and <S%G2597>descending<s%> on the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man.<s%>"
